container.subtitle: I would love to share my experiences and stories with you, and let me hear yours as well.

section.title: Design Philosophy
messages: I'm a UX/UI Designer who is passionate about solving problems and bridging the gap between user needs and business strategy.

container.subtitle: Design Philosophy
messages: I am a critical thinker who wants to create innovative designs.
I believe in the power of storytelling.
“Speak the user’s language or be consistent” — Steve Krug
I design self-evident, usable, useful, efficient, delightful, and memorable websites or mobile apps.

container.title: My Story
messages: I'm a UX/UI Designer with a master's in Web Design and New Media from the Academy of Art University, San Francisco. I have a passion for application, web, mobile, and product design.

I can do creative product design through market research, graphic design, branding, motion graphics, and illustrations. I'm passionate about solving problems and bridging the gap between user needs and business strategy.
I bring 3+ years of work experience in sales, teaching, and customer service. These experiences sparked my curiosity in UX and led me to pursue this shift through AAU & Springboard.
I’m ready for new challenges and seeking new adventures. I sincerely look forward to speaking with you about finding my next team.
